abstract: The agency announced that Sheila C. Bair will end her five-year term on July 8.
snippet: The agency announced that Sheila C. Bair will end her five-year term on July 8.
lead_paragraph: Sheila C. Bair, one of the banking industry’s most influential regulators and outspoken critics during the financial crisis, said on Monday that she planned to step down as chairwoman of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation on July 8.

headline.main: F.D.I.C. Chairwoman to Leave in July
